sources.title: Little Nemo
sources.description: Little Nemo a very early (1911) animation by Windsor McKay

sources.title: Little Nemo
sources.description: Little Nemo is a very early animation (1911) drawn by Windsor McCay and based on his comic strip, Little Nemo in Slumberland. It is interesting in that it shows McCay drawing the pictures which will later go into the animation.

metadata.Plot: A young boy whose dreams transcend reality is sucked into his own fantasy, which is everything he has dreamed of until he unleashes a century old secret that may not only destroy this perfect dream world but reality itself.
metadata.Writer: Chris Columbus, Richard Outten, Jean 'Moebius' Giraud
metadata.Actors: Gabriel Damon, Mickey Rooney, Rene Auberjonois
